summary: After a night of drinking, Rachel (Laura Ramsey), a diplomat working in Mexico City finds her world turned upside down after she's saved by Alejandro (Jaime Camil), a Mariachi singer whose visa was rejected the day before - by Rachel.
cast: Jaime Camil|Laura Ramsey|Omar Chaparro|Aurora Papile|Renata Ybarra|Mariachi Juvenil de Tecalitlán|Stockard Channing|Tom Arnold|Roberto Sosa|Carlos Macias|Jorge Zárate|Emilio Guerrero|Juan Pablo Gil|Luis Fernando Peña|María del Carmen Farias|Alejandra Gollas|Itzel Puentes|Sara Mosqueda|Andrea Yactic|Fernando Becerril|Tomihuatzi Xelhuantzin|Tomás Owen|Marco Antonio Aguirre|Fernando Garcia|Jaime Estrada|Kerry Ardra|Pilar Ixquic Mata|Macarena Miguel|Memo Rabadan|Antonio Alegre|Luisa Huertas|Áureo Baqueiro|Mariachi Femenil Neuvo Tecalitlán|Hector Garzán|Roberto Brondo
title: Amor a primera Visa
